Faction.Name: Adventurer
Faction.Description: Members of the guild of adventurers, brave (or foolish) souls that seek out the thrills, challenges and rewards of forgotten tombs and abandoned forts.

Buff2.Description: All skills serve the adventurer. The jack of all trades is the survivor of many encounters.

Buff3.Description: A broad base of knowledge helps an adventurer survive.

Buff4.Description: Those who focus too heavily in one area become blind to dangers coming from another.

Buff5.Description: The most talented adventurers are parties of themselves. They can fullfill any role.
